short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create followers/following list of IG linked account on ubrand.co, and start engagement process with the recommended users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
uBrand is a software built for brand conscious organizations. In our world, only the strongest brands survive, and uBrand is the competitive edge and catalyst in the evolution of digital branding. 

You point out your competition, and we will:
	• Deliver YOU a scout report on THEIR followers
	• Break down their past social media moves in our "film room"
	• Huddle with your brand strategist  and ambassadors
	• Give you a segmented strategy by competitor
	• Ensure every social engagement is timely, relevant, and authentic. 
	• Keep score how many of your competitive, non-followers,  convert into engaged assets. 

At beta, we are the hunter and gatherers of your brands evolution, we play an essential role. Our software is built to evolve and we will reach sentient, autonomous, digital branding.  

Visit www.ubrand.co/ to use our software.
